name: Minior Core Form
primaryAbilityEffect: When this Pokémon enters battle and at the end of each turn, if its HP is 50% or above, it changes into Meteor Form; otherwise, it changes into Core Form. In Meteor Form, it cannot be given a major status ailment (though existing ones are not cured), cannot become drowsy from Yawn, and cannot use Rest (which will simply fail). This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified. This ability only takes effect for Minior.

name: Minior Meteor Form
primaryAbilityEffect: When this Pokémon enters battle and at the end of each turn, if its HP is 50% or above, it changes into Meteor Form; otherwise, it changes into Core Form. In Meteor Form, it cannot be given a major status ailment (though existing ones are not cured), cannot become drowsy from Yawn, and cannot use Rest (which will simply fail). This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified. This ability only takes effect for Minior.

name: Komala
primaryAbilityEffect: This Pokémon always acts as though it were asleep. It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by Yawn; it can use Sleep Talk; and so on.

name: Turtonator
primaryAbilityEffect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon. This ability functions identically to Battle Armor.

name: Togedemaru
primaryAbilityEffect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to Rough Skin.
secondaryAbilityEffect: All other Pokémon's single-target electric-type moves are redirected to this Pokémon if it is an eligible target. Other Pokémon's Electric moves raise this Pokémon's Special Attack one stage, negating any other effect on it, and cannot miss it. If the move's intended target also has this ability, the move is not redirected. When multiple Pokémon with this ability are possible targets for redirection, the move is redirected to the one with the highest Speed stat, or, in the case of a tie, to a random tied Pokémon. Follow Me takes precedence over this ability. If the Pokémon is a ground-type and thus immune to Electric moves, its immunity prevents the Special Attack boost.
hiddenAbilityEffect: When this Pokémon is at full HP, any hit that would knock it out will instead leave it with 1 HP. Regardless of its current HP, it is also immune to the one-hit KO moves: Fissure, Guillotine, Horn Drill, and Sheer Cold. If this Pokémon is holding a Focus Sash, this ability takes precedence and the item will not be consumed.

name: Mimikyu
primaryAbilityEffect: If this Pokémon is in its Disguised Form and takes damage from a move, it switches to its Busted Form and the damage is prevented. Other effects are not prevented. This ability cannot be copied or replaced. This ability only takes effect for Mimikyu.

name: Bruxish
primaryAbilityEffect: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
secondaryAbilityEffect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
hiddenAbilityEffect: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

name: Drampa
primaryAbilityEffect: Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move that causes its HP to drop below 50%, its Special Attack rises by one stage.
secondaryAbilityEffect: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
hiddenAbilityEffect: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to Air Lock.

name: Dhelmise
primaryAbilityEffect: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.

name: Jangmo-o
primaryAbilityEffect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves. This includes Acid Spray, Aura Sphere, Barrage, Beak Blast, Bullet Seed, Egg Bomb, Electro Ball, Energy Ball, Focus Blast, Gyro Ball, Ice Ball, Magnet Bomb, Mist Ball, Mud Bomb, Octazooka, Pollen Puff, Rock Blast, Rock Wrecker, Searing Shot, Seed Bomb, Shadow Ball, Sludge Bomb, Weather Ball, Zap Cannon.
secondaryAbilityEffect: This Pokémon is immune to moves flagged as being sound-based. Heal Bell is unaffected. Uproar still prevents this Pokémon from sleeping. This Pokémon can still receive a Perish Song counter through Baton Pass, and will retain a Perish Song counter if it acquires this ability after Perish Song is used. Howl, Roar Of Time, Sonic Boom, and Yawn are not flagged as sound-based.
hiddenAbilityEffect: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.
notes: This Pokémon was released "by accident" in early 2020 / early Unova and was removed again shortly after. It is now only obtainable by trade, but as only few players had access to Unova at that point, not many of this Pokémon exist.
